Aug. 5, 1907 D Pontypridd Contest (Class C)
Pontypridd Contest (Class C) 30 Test Piece Contest Pontypridd Contest pontypridd-contest-class-c
Gems of Haydn [arr. W. Rimmer]
Pontypridd, Rhondda Cynon Taf, Wales, UK 1st prize £9 and cup. 2nd prize £7. 3rd prize £5. 4 bands competed.
March 31, 2012, 6:51 a.m. July 4, 2015, 7:39 p.m.
